name: Cornellius The Corn - Design Jam
description:
Cornellius the Corn is a tech prototype to demostrate the use of gravity platforming. In this prototype Cornellius must guide himself through a small cluster of floating islands to a salad leaf on a bowl of chilli. 

Design Jam Theme: Floating Islands (5 Days)

WASD to Move

Space to Jump

R to Restart 

O to turn off music
